claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: Partial capture of page 1 header from the journal Vaccine (Elsevier) showing the journal name, homepage URL, and the beginning of the article title regarding the efficacy of a trivalent recombinant hemagglutinin protein vaccine. does not support the claim Note: Only the header and partial title are visible; no data or figure content is shown to assess immune response breadth or cross-protection.
